Container.Name: shuvcode
Container.Overview:
Shuvcode is an enhanced fork of OpenCode - an open-source AI coding agent that provides a web-based interface for AI-assisted development.
This container runs Shuvcode in web mode, allowing you to access the AI coding agent from any browser on your network. It includes development tools like Node.js, Python, npm, and git for complete coding workflows.
Key Features: - Web-based terminal UI accessible from any device - Mobile PWA support with responsive design - Multi-provider support (Anthropic, OpenAI, Google, Azure, local models) - Built-in development environment with Node.js, Python, git - Persistent configuration and session history - Project file access for AI-assisted coding - Auto-update with session-aware restart - Install custom packages at runtime via environment variables - Custom server URL settings for self-hosted deployments - Enhanced features from upstream PRs
After installation, open the WebUI and use /connect to configure your LLM provider API key.

Config.Name: Config
Config.Description: Shuvcode configuration files (opencode.json, auth.json, agents, commands)

Config.Name: Cache
Config.Description: Shuvcode cache files (can be cleared safely)

Config.Name: Projects
Config.Description: Directory containing your project files for AI-assisted coding

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Internal port for Shuvcode web server (should match WebUI Port)

Config.Name: Extra APT Packages
Config.Description: Space-separated list of additional apt packages to install (e.g., golang ruby lua5.4)

Config.Name: Extra NPM Packages
Config.Description: Space-separated list of additional npm packages to install globally (e.g., typescript tsx pnpm)

Config.Name: Extra PIP Packages
Config.Description: Space-separated list of additional pip packages to install (e.g., black ruff mypy)

Config.Name: Update Check Interval
Config.Description: How often to check for Shuvcode updates in seconds (3600 = 1 hour)

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: API key for Anthropic/Claude (optional - can also configure via /connect command)

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: API key for OpenAI (optional - can also configure via /connect command)

Config.Name: Google API Key
Config.Description: API key for Google Gemini (optional - can also configure via /connect command)

Config.Name: Disable Auto-Update
Config.Description: Disable automatic Shuvcode updates (updates only apply when no active sessions)
